feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission demonstrates a functioning financial application: it monitors multiple stocks (20), fetches price updates, and sends email alerts (implementation with API keys). The student also reflects on volatility and investment horizon, showing both practical operation and financial interpretation, meeting the PASS standard.
- Integrate AI: The student clearly integrated AI components (AI builder, OpenAI/Gemini APIs) into the tool and used them to produce actionable outputs (email alerts with long-term investment recommendations). The DRIVER stages (Discover–Implement–Reflect) show the AI was purposefully incorporated and evaluated, meeting the criterion that AI integration adds value.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "what I wanted to kind of inspire and wanted to sort of create was um a financial tool where I can um monitor a set number of stocks"
"I was able to get all my API keys from Open AI."
"I do also have 20 stocks that I'm actually monitoring."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover: student identified the need to build a stock-monitoring financial tool. Implement: student obtained API keys and executed the workflow to fetch prices and send alerts. Reflect: student analyzed volatility and long-term vs. short-term use, showing conceptual evaluation of financial outputs.
criteria.reasoning: The submission demonstrates a functioning financial application: it monitors multiple stocks (20), fetches price updates, and sends email alerts (implementation with API keys). The student also reflects on volatility and investment horizon, showing both practical operation and financial interpretation, meeting the PASS standard.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "here I have my AI builder uh help me build each of these steps to where I'm getting stock prices checked every so often."
"I was able to get all my API keys from Open AI."
"my AI investment tool... tells me that based on the current stock data here, my recommendations for long-term investments, 5 to 10 years, uh, Google, current price, $320, high volatility"
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover: identified need for an automated stock-monitoring tool; Implement: obtained OpenAI API keys and executed the workflow; Reflect: reviewed AI-generated recommendations and discussed volatility implications.
criteria.reasoning: The student clearly integrated AI components (AI builder, OpenAI/Gemini APIs) into the tool and used them to produce actionable outputs (email alerts with long-term investment recommendations). The DRIVER stages (Discover–Implement–Reflect) show the AI was purposefully incorporated and evaluated, meeting the criterion that AI integration adds value.
